mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_INFO( BOOK_INFO_ATTACHED_FILE_NAME, BOOK_INFO_ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , BOOK_INTRO , BOOK_CATE_CODE , BOOK_CODE) VALUES( #{libraryBookInfoVO.bookInfoAttachedFileName}, #{libraryBookInfoVO.bookInfoOriginFileName}, #{libraryBookInfoVO.bookIntro}, #{libraryBookInfoVO.bookCateCode}, #{libraryBookInfoVO.bookCode})
INSERT INTO BOOK( BOOK_CODE , BOOK_TITLE , BOOK_WRITER , BOOK_PUB , BOOK_YEAR) VALUES( #{bookCode}, #{bookTitle}, #{bookWriter}, #{bookPub}, #{bookYear})
